events.name: Farewell Party 2020
events.description: A farewell for graduating batch. Please do come and show them your love. Food and drinks available for free.

events.name: Convocation Batch 2020
events.description: A convocation for graduating batch. Please come on time and show respect to the special guests.

events.name: Halloween
events.description: This is not for the light hearted one. Spooky and scary. Please be dressed. Entry not permitted in daily casuals.
